parameters:
Just between us, it seems that the academy's principal and the lord of
this town get along quite well.
A

The academy is in a position like extraterritoriality, beyond the
reach of the lord's power.
B
It seems like the Lord wants to have influence in the Academy as well.
C
... Actually, I also work as an information broker.
I often teach cute girls for free.
A
B
C

The hair growth tonic made with alchemy seems to work on more than
just the head.
Could someone pour me a drink, young one?
I'm off duty now.
The alcohol and food are delicious, but there's a shortage of women.
A
Hmm? You're cute, but you're lacking in the chest department.
A

You probably think there are a lot of vulgar men, but that's just how
it is in a tavern.

I had some drinks, so maybe we should go to the shop in the back
later.

There was a warehouse near the square, but what are they storing
there?

There seems to be a casino in this town, but it doesn't exist in this
town, huh?

It seems that there are stray monsters called Unique Monsters in
various places.

However, they seem to be stronger than ordinary monsters, so if you're
going to fight them, you need to be careful.
